Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Pulmonary Emphysema/Lung, Hyperlucent
Record.Description: A lung with reduced markings on its chest radiograph and increased areas of transradiancy (hyperlucency). A hyperlucent lung is usually associated with pulmonary emphysema or PNEUMOTHORAX.A pneumothorax condition marked by complete absence of markings in the chest radiograph.
